content: scrap yarn rm continue to slip sts until marker rm twice 70 82 90 98 110 118 126 sts on needles after this division you should have two slices per sleeve two slices for the front and two slices for the back the slip_stitch columns along edges of the sleeves are knit together with the body continue working stst in the round until sweater measures 9 10 11 12 13 14 15 inches from neck to hem work defined ribbing pattern for hem sleeves slip sts from scrap yarn onto needles placing a marker directly under the armpit round 1 k round 2 k1 k2tog k to 3 sts before end of round ssk k1 repeat rounds 1-2 once more work stst until sleeve measures 5 5 6 25 7 7 5 8 8 5 9 inches or 1 5 from desired sleeve length work defined ribbing pattern for cuffs hem & cuff pattern round 1 - a k1 p1 round 2 - b k1 p1 repeat rounds 1-2 3 times repeat round 1 once more bind off with color b © raya budrevich of blissful knits & dyeworks all rights reserved 2010 this is a personal use pattern you may not sell or profit from items made with this pattern retail licenses are available please contact me for detail this pattern may not be reprinted or distributed in any form for free or for resale blissful knits & dyeworks august 2011 3 version 1 1 questions email photuris@gmail com or visit www blissfulknits com for pattern support every effort has been made to ensure that the pattern is as complete as possible and the pattern has been carefully tested and edited blissful knits & dyeworks august 2011 4 version 1 1
